Message:
As I uttered this,
a blazing pillar of fire
pierced the sky...
only to extinguish
before my eyes.

I harness the power of words.
Whatever I say becomes reality.

If I say, “Burn,” a fire erupts.
If I say, “Freeze,”
there’ll be a blizzard.

The other villagers were
overjoyed to discover my power.
“To conjure anything
and bend reality to your will...
Your potential is limitless,”
they said.

But, I couldn’t control it...
Even if I imagined
a small campfire,
I would summon
an overwhelming blaze.

Any useful power becomes
useless unless you can master it.
If anything, one as boundless
as mine only becomes
a looming threat.

...Maybe I should just keep quiet
like the others say.
